lead_paragraph: Jamie Gold, a former Hollywood agent, won the World Series of Poker yesterday in Las Vegas. Gold, 36, convinced Paul Wasicka he had a weaker hand, getting him to push all his chips in the pot. Gold’s pair of queens beat Wasicka’s pair of 10’s. Gold won $12 million.
